definition: Peking University (abbr. for 北京大學|北京大学)
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
the Great Northern Wilderness (in Northern China)
Northeastern University (in Shenyang 瀋陽市|沈阳市[Shen3 yang2 shi4], Liaoning)/Tōhoku University, Sendai, Japan

pinyin: Bei3 Da4 xi1 Yang2 Gong1 yue1 Zu3 zhi1

sentences.english: NATO is how you abbreviate the North Atlantic Treaty Organization.
sentences.chinese: 北大西洋公约组织常被缩写成NATO。

sentences.english: This is the website of College of Life Science, Hebei University.
sentences.chinese: 这是河北大学生命科学学院的网站。

sentences.english: Professor Li, from Beijing University, will give a talk on how to improve our listening and spoken English.
sentences.chinese: 北大李教授将作如何提高英语听力和口语能力的报告。

sentences.english: The biggest oceangoing ships on the North Atlantic arrived and departed.
sentences.chinese: 那些北大西洋上最大的远洋船到达了，离开了。

sentences.english: It's 45th North Street, Manhattan, New York, US.
sentences.chinese: 美国纽约曼哈顿区北大街45号。

sentences.english: If you never heard of PKU , don't sweat it.
sentences.chinese: 如果你从未听说过北大，没有汗水它。

sentences.english: Divisions where you would like to have training and names of Prof.
sentences.chinese: 东北大学医学部特别聴讲生愿书。

sentences.english: One is called Medicine Capital North Street.
sentences.chinese: 其中一条主干道的名字就叫“药都北大街“。

sentences.english: Yes, and she teaches in Peking University after graduation there.
sentences.chinese: 是的，她从北大毕业以后还在母校执教。

sentences.english: Founder and IBM arrive a technique alliance, and so on.
sentences.chinese: 北大方正公司与IBM达成了技术合作联盟等。

sentences.english: Wang Li's father have taught English here since his graduation from Peking University.
sentences.chinese: 王立的父亲从北大毕业后就一直在这任教。

sentences.english: Our new flat is in a high building near Beidajie Street.
sentences.chinese: 我们的新家在北大街附近的一座高楼里。

sentences.english: Beijing Beida Jade. Bird Universal Sci-Tech Company …
sentences.chinese: 北京北大青鸟环宇科技股份有限公司。

sentences.english: After the conversazione, the Students Art Group presented a scene of wonderful performance.
sentences.chinese: 会后，北大学生艺术团做了精彩的汇报演出。

sentences.english: The Center's influence extends far beyond its campus.
sentences.chinese: 中国经济中心的力已远远超出了北大校园。

definition: abbr. for 清華大學|清华大学[Qing1 hua2 Da4 xue2]
Tsinghua or Qinghua University, Beijing/National Tsing Hua University, Hsinchu, Taiwan
Fudan University, Shanghai, abbr. for 復旦大學|复旦大学[Fu4 dan4 Da4 xue2]
Beijing Normal University/abbr. for 北京師範大學|北京师范大学[Bei3 jing1 Shi1 fan4 Da4 xue2]
Jiaotong University/University of Communications/abbr. of 交通大學|交通大学[Jiao1 tong1 Da4 xue2]
Nanjing University, NJU (abbr. for 南京大學|南京大学[Nan2 jing1 Da4 xue2])

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Ren2 min2 Da4 xue2

definition: universities and colleges/abbr. for 高等學校|高等学校
Nankai district of Tianjin municipality 天津市[Tian1 jin1 shi4]
